item.title: Lindsey add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "Don't think. Thinking is the enemy of creativity. It's self-conscious and anything self-conscious is lousy. You can't "try" to do things. You simply "must" do things." -- Ray Bradbury

item.title: Lindsey add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "Reserving judgements is a matter of infinite hope." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Lindsey add a quote by Ian McEwan
item.description: "Watching him during the first several minutes of his delivery, Cecilia felt a pleasant sinking sensation in her stomach as she contemplated how deliciously self-destructive it would be, almost erotic, to be married to a man so nearly handsome, so hugely rich, so unfathomably stupid. He would fill her with his big-faced children, all of them loud, boneheaded boys with a passion for guns and football and aeroplanes." -- Ian McEwan
